General.Name: Trafalgar New Homes Plc
General.Description: Trafalgar Property Group plc, through its subsidiaries, engages in residual property development business in the United Kingdom. The company undertakes residential property and assisted living projects. It is also involved in the renting of residential properties. The company was formerly known as Trafalgar New Homes Plc and changed its name to Trafalgar Property Group plc in March 2018. Trafalgar Property Group plc was incorporated in 2001 and is based in Edenbridge, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: Chequers Barn, Edenbridge, United Kingdom, TN8 7PD
